document_data.name: ''Necklace of Adaptation''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''necklace of adaptation''''' was a magical necklace that protected the wearer from things that affected their ability to breathe.
document_data.Description: It took the form of a [[platinum]] medallion hanging on a heavy chain.
document_data.Powers: This necklace allowed the user to breathe under suffocating circumstances, even when underwater but not in a vacuum such as space. By wrapping the wearer with a field of fresh air.
document_data.Creation: Crafting one required an ''[[alter self]]'' spell.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Algashon Nathaire]]: a [[priest]] of [[Bane]] who was responsible for [[Sammaster]]'s madness.
* [[Bleys Dhacrylon]]: a [[vampire]] hunter from [[Waterdeep]] possessed an [[electrum]] ''[[holy symbol]]'' of [[Sune]] that had powers of a ''necklace of adaptation''.
* [[Calvin Longbottle]] owned a scrimshaw version of this amulet that was shaped like a [[porpoise]].<ref>
* [[Jannaxil Serpentil]]: a very disliked [[book]] seller and a fence from Waterdeep.
* [[Nythra]] of Seven Rivers: a [[Rashemi]] [[wizard]] who was known to travel the [[Astral Plane]] and taking missions to [[Thay]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Solonor Thelandira]]: the [[elf|elven]] [[god]] of archery, whose [[avatar]] wore a ''necklace of adaptation''.
* [[Pikel Bouldershoulder]]: an eccentric [[dwarf]] [[druid]] who was said to have a ''necklace of adaptation'' as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Trivia: [[Monadic deva]]s could naturally breathe in any environment as if they wore a ''necklace of adaptation''.
